title: SQARR Mini Glass Prep Pinch Bowls, 3.5 inch 4 oz Clear Glass Bowls for Condiments, Small Glass Bowls, and Pinch Bowls (6 Pack)
descriptions:
Introducing the SQARR Mini Glass Prep Pinch Bowls, the perfect addition to your kitchenware collection! These 3.5 inch 4 oz Clear Glass Bowls come in a convenient 6 pack, providing you with ample bowls for all your culinary needs.

Crafted from high-quality glass, these bowls are not only stylish and elegant, but they are also designed to last. Their non-porous nature ensures that they do not absorb odors or stains, making them perfect for holding condiments, spices, ingredients, and even candy or desserts. 

With their 4 oz capacity, these bowls are suitable for both hot and cold foods, and their sleek and simple design adds a touch of sophistication to any dish. Whether you're serving condiments at a dinner party or holding loose tea leaves or spices while cooking, these bowls are versatile and practical.

But that's not all! These bowls are also microwave safe, allowing you to easily heat up your ingredients or leftovers without transferring them to another container. And when it's time to clean up, simply pop them in the dishwasher for hassle-free maintenance. Plus, their stackable design makes storage a breeze, saving you valuable space in your kitchen.

These SQARR Mini Glass Prep Pinch Bowls are suitable for use in restaurants, cafes, bakeries, and homes alike. Their durability sets them apart from traditional glass, ensuring that they will withstand the test of time.

Upgrade your kitchen with these versatile and stylish bowls. Don't miss out on the opportunity to own the SQARR Mini Glass Prep Pinch Bowls - order your 6 pack today!
